00023 template < class Tp_, class Distance_ > struct r_a_iterator
00024 {
00025     typedef std::random_access_iterator_tag iterator_category;
00026     typedef Tp_ value_type;
00027     typedef Distance_ difference_type;
00028     typedef Tp_ * pointer;
00029     typedef Tp_ & reference;
00030 };
00031 
00032 #define STXXL_ADAPTOR_ARITHMETICS(pos) \
00033     bool operator == (const _Self & a) const \
00034     { \
00035         return (a.pos == pos); \
00036     }  \
00037     bool operator != (const _Self & a) const \
00038     { \
00039         return (a.pos != pos); \
00040     }  \
00041     bool operator < (const _Self & a) const \
00042     { \
00043         return (pos < a.pos); \
00044     }  \
00045     bool operator > (const _Self & a) const \
00046     { \
00047         return (pos > a.pos); \
00048     }  \
00049     bool operator <= (const _Self & a) const \
00050     { \
00051         return (pos <= a.pos); \
00052     }  \
00053     bool operator >= (const _Self & a) const \
00054     { \
00055         return (pos >= a.pos); \
00056     }  \
00057     _Self operator + (pos_type off) const \
00058     { \
00059         return _Self (array, pos + off); \
00060     } \
00061     _Self operator - (pos_type off) const \
00062     { \
00063         return _Self (array, pos - off); \
00064     } \
00065     _Self & operator ++ () \
00066     { \
00067         pos++; \
00068         return *this; \
00069     } \
00070     _Self operator ++ (int)  \
00071     { \
00072         _Self tmp = *this; \
00073         pos++; \
00074         return tmp; \
00075     } \
00076     _Self & operator -- () \
00077     { \
00078         pos--; \
00079         return *this; \
00080     } \
00081     _Self operator -- (int) \
00082     { \
00083         _Self tmp = *this; \
00084         pos--; \
00085         return tmp; \
00086     } \
00087     pos_type operator - (const _Self & a) const \
00088     { \
00089         return pos - a.pos; \
00090     } \
00091     _Self & operator -= (pos_type off) \
00092     { \
00093         pos -= off; \
00094         return *this; \
00095     } \
00096     _Self & operator += (pos_type off) \
00097     { \
00098         pos += off; \
00099         return *this; \
00100     }

00102 template < class one_dim_array_type, class data_type,
00103           class pos_type >
00104 struct TwoToOneDimArrayAdaptorBase : public r_a_iterator <
00105                                                           data_type, pos_type >
00106 {
00107     one_dim_array_type * array;
00108     pos_type pos;
00109     typedef pos_type _pos_type;
00110     typedef TwoToOneDimArrayAdaptorBase < one_dim_array_type,
00111                                          data_type, pos_type > _Self;
00112 
00113 
00114 
00115     TwoToOneDimArrayAdaptorBase ()
00116     { };
00117 
00118     TwoToOneDimArrayAdaptorBase (one_dim_array_type * a, pos_type p) : array (a),
00119                                                                        pos(p)
00120     { };
00121     TwoToOneDimArrayAdaptorBase (const TwoToOneDimArrayAdaptorBase &a) : array (a.array),
00122                                                                          pos (a.pos)
00123     { };
00124 
00125     STXXL_ADAPTOR_ARITHMETICS(pos)
00126 };
00127

00131 #define BLOCK_ADAPTOR_OPERATORS(two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base)              \
00132                                                                                 \
00133     template <unsigned _blk_sz, typename _run_type, class __pos_type>                                 \
00134     inline two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz, _run_type, __pos_type> & operator ++ (  \
00135         two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base < _blk_sz, _run_type, __pos_type > & a)              \
00136     { \
00137         a.pos++;                                                                      \
00138         return a;                                                                     \
00139     }                                                                               \
00140                                                                                 \
00141     template <unsigned _blk_sz, typename _run_type, class __pos_type>                                 \
00142     inline two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz, _run_type, __pos_type> operator ++ (    \
00143         two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base < _blk_sz, _run_type, __pos_type > & a, int)         \
00144     { \
00145         two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz, _run_type, __pos_type> tmp = a;              \
00146         a.pos++;                                                                      \
00147         return tmp;                                                                   \
00148     }                                                                               \
00149                                                                                 \
00150     template <unsigned _blk_sz, typename _run_type, class __pos_type>                                 \
00151     inline two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz, _run_type, __pos_type> & operator -- (  \
00152         two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base < _blk_sz, _run_type, __pos_type > & a)              \
00153     { \
00154         a.pos--;                                                                      \
00155         return a;                                                                     \
00156     }                                                                               \
00157                                                                                 \
00158     template <unsigned _blk_sz, typename _run_type, class __pos_type>                                 \
00159     inline two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz, _run_type, __pos_type> operator -- (    \
00160         two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base < _blk_sz, _run_type, __pos_type > & a, int)         \
00161     { \
00162         two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz, _run_type, __pos_type> tmp = a;                      \
00163         a.pos--;                                                                              \
00164         return tmp;                                                                           \
00165     }                                                                                       \
00166                                                                                         \
00167     template <unsigned _blk_sz, typename _run_type, class __pos_type>                                         \
00168     inline two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz, _run_type, __pos_type> & operator -= (          \
00169         two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base < _blk_sz, _run_type, __pos_type > & a, \
00170         typename two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz, _run_type, __pos_type>::_pos_type off)          \
00171     { \
00172         a.pos -= off;                                                                           \
00173         return a;                                                                             \
00174     }                                                                                       \
00175                                                                                         \
00176     template <unsigned _blk_sz, typename _run_type, class __pos_type>                                         \
00177     inline two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz, _run_type, __pos_type> & operator += (          \
00178         two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base < _blk_sz, _run_type, __pos_type > & a, \
00179         typename two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz, _run_type, __pos_type>::_pos_type off)          \
00180     { \
00181         a.pos += off;                                                                           \
00182         return a;                                                                             \
00183     }                                                                                       \
00184                                                                                         \
00185     template <unsigned _blk_sz, typename _run_type, class __pos_type>                                         \
00186     inline two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz, _run_type, __pos_type> operator + (             \
00187         const two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz, _run_type, __pos_type> & a, \
00188         typename two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz, _run_type, __pos_type>::_pos_type off)           \
00189     { \
00190         return two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz, _run_type, __pos_type>(a.array, a.pos + off);  \
00191     }                                                                                       \
00192                                                                                         \
00193     template <unsigned _blk_sz, typename _run_type, class __pos_type>                                         \
00194     inline two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz, _run_type, __pos_type> operator + (             \
00195         typename two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz, _run_type, __pos_type>::_pos_type off, \
00196         const two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz, _run_type, __pos_type> & a)                        \
00197     { \
00198         return two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz, _run_type, __pos_type>(a.array, a.pos + off);  \
00199     }                                                                                       \
00200                                                                                         \
00201     template <unsigned _blk_sz, typename _run_type, class __pos_type>                                         \
00202     inline two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz, _run_type, __pos_type> operator - (             \
00203         const two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz, _run_type, __pos_type> & a, \
00204         typename two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz, _run_type, __pos_type>::_pos_type off)          \
00205     { \
00206         return two_to_one_dim_array_adaptor_base<_blk_sz, _run_type, __pos_type>(a.array, a.pos - off);  \
00207     }

00211 template < class one_dim_array_type, class data_type,
00212           unsigned dim_size, class pos_type =
00213               int_type >struct TwoToOneDimArrayRowAdaptor : public
00214 TwoToOneDimArrayAdaptorBase < one_dim_array_type, data_type,
00215                              pos_type >
00216 {
00217     typedef TwoToOneDimArrayRowAdaptor < one_dim_array_type,
00218                                         data_type, dim_size, pos_type > _Self;
00219 
00220     typedef TwoToOneDimArrayAdaptorBase < one_dim_array_type,
00221                                          data_type, pos_type > _Parent;
00222     using _Parent::array;
00223     using _Parent::pos;
00224 
00225     TwoToOneDimArrayRowAdaptor ()
00226     { };
00227     TwoToOneDimArrayRowAdaptor (one_dim_array_type * a,
00228                                 pos_type
00229                                 p) : TwoToOneDimArrayAdaptorBase <
00230                                                                   one_dim_array_type, data_type, pos_type > (a, p)
00231     { }
00232     TwoToOneDimArrayRowAdaptor (const TwoToOneDimArrayRowAdaptor &
00233                                 a) : TwoToOneDimArrayAdaptorBase <
00234                                                                   one_dim_array_type, data_type, pos_type > (a)
00235     { }
00236 
00237     data_type & operator * ()
00238     {
00239         return array[(pos) / dim_size][(pos) % dim_size];
00240     }
00241 
00242     data_type * operator -> () const
00243     {
00244         return &(array[(pos) / dim_size][(pos) % dim_size]);
00245     }
00246 
00247     data_type & operator [](pos_type n)
00248     {
00249         n += pos;
00250         return array[(n) / dim_size][(n) % dim_size];
00251     }
00252     STXXL_ADAPTOR_ARITHMETICS(pos)
00253 };
00254 
00255 template < class one_dim_array_type, class data_type,
00256           unsigned dim_size, class pos_type =
00257               int_type >struct TwoToOneDimArrayColumnAdaptor : public
00258 TwoToOneDimArrayAdaptorBase < one_dim_array_type, data_type,
00259                              pos_type >
00260 {
00261     typedef TwoToOneDimArrayColumnAdaptor < one_dim_array_type,
00262                                            data_type, dim_size, pos_type > _Self;
00263 
00264     using TwoToOneDimArrayAdaptorBase < one_dim_array_type, data_type, pos_type >::pos;
00265     using TwoToOneDimArrayAdaptorBase < one_dim_array_type, data_type, pos_type >::array;
00266 
00267     TwoToOneDimArrayColumnAdaptor (one_dim_array_type * a,
00268                                    pos_type
00269                                    p) : TwoToOneDimArrayAdaptorBase
00270                                         < one_dim_array_type, data_type, pos_type > (a, p)
00271     { }
00272     TwoToOneDimArrayColumnAdaptor (const _Self &
00273                                    a) : TwoToOneDimArrayAdaptorBase
00274                                         < one_dim_array_type, data_type, pos_type > (a)
00275     { }
00276 
00277     data_type & operator * ()
00278     {
00279         return array[(pos) % dim_size][(pos) / dim_size];
00280     }
00281 
00282     data_type * operator -> () const
00283     {
00284         return &(array[(pos) % dim_size][(pos) / dim_size]);
00285     }
00286 
00287     const data_type & operator [] (pos_type n) const
00288     {
00289         n += pos;
00290         return array[(n) % dim_size][(n) / dim_size];
00291     }
00292 
00293     data_type & operator [](pos_type n)
00294     {
00295         n += pos;
00296         return array[(n) % dim_size][(n) / dim_size];
00297     }
00298     STXXL_ADAPTOR_ARITHMETICS(pos)
00299 };
